extendedInfo.description: Too many apps are installed on your phone?Home Page is too full to add any more shortcuts?Apps on your home Page are not used for a while?Too many clicks to get to the apps you need?Tired of cleaning up and managing the shortcuts?Let Smart Launcher eases your headache! Smart Launcher's proprietary algorithm learns your behavior of using applications and AUTOMATICALLY SAVE your favorite app shortcuts in a folder. It update users app ranks in real time while users are using the phone. Smart Launcher saves clicks which also save user battery consumption. The algorithm will take some times to learn your behavior. Please allow a few days for it to work as designed. Widget feature is supported. No live wallpaper is supported in this app.Widget feature supports the daily app recommendation. It does daily behavior analyzing and predicting your favorite applications.Features:-favorite app organizer-recently opened app organizer-user selected app organizer-tracking installed/uninstalled app-add the least used application feature-Japanese, German, Chinese, Korean, French, Spanish, Italian language supportedPatent Pending in process.Tag:smart launcher, smart favorite app, Top app, App organizer, Folder organizer, go launcher, application organizer, Most Used Apps, MRU, LRU, Least Used Apps

reviews.title: Handy, But...
reviews.comment: I used this app for months  quite a few versions ago so that I wouldn\'t have to get a home launcher or pay for a good app folder app. But now this app doesn\'t automatically detects most used apps and you have to manually remove apps it puts there by accident. I use alternative apps. :-(

reviews.title: THIS APP WAS ONE OF MY FAVORITES...
reviews.comment: I REALLY LIKED THIS APP, BUT IT STARTED TO PUT THE APPS THAT I NEVER USE YOU KNOW THE ONES THE ONES THAT GET AUTO UPDATED AND PRACTIALLY RENDER THE CELLPHONE USELESS. SO THIS GETS UNINSTALLED. I WAS GOING TO MAKE THIS THE CENTERPIECE ON MY HOMESCREEN IT IS VISUALLY DESERVE-ED OF THAT PLACE BUT NOT NOW BECAUSE IT CHANGED FROM BEING A HELPFUL TOOL TO JUST ANOTHER BILLBOARD. I AGREED TO LOOKING AT ADS BUT NOT SCARRING MY CENTERPIECE. UNINSTALL .

reviews.title: good idea but too buggy
reviews.comment: many times per day the background agent force closes.  the spin wheel is truly awesome but a little jerky at first, possibly while things get cached; maybe should pre-load.  app departs from using native toolkit too much.  biggest issue is crashing all the time in background... app needs work but great idea.  will try again in a while.
